if you're looking to do the 6.8% as a new user  you can deposit up to 60k for the 6.8%. but if you're also looking to optimize sign up rewards  you can deposit up to 100k to get $880 in terms of stock rewards. if im not wrong  putting 100k should still allow you to get 6.8% returns on 60k and remaining 40k will get Fullerton SGD returns (last i checked was ~3.7-3.8%)
